trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition> of each branch is determined before the branch is run.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>의 각 분기는 분기를 실행 하기 전에 결정 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition>

trans-unit.source: The first IfElseBranchActivity in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> that evaluates to `true` is run.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 IfElseBranchActivity의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>으로 계산 되는 `true` 실행 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity"> </xref> 클래스 활동의 이름을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> object reference for the current branch activity.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> 개체 현재 분기 활동에 대 한 참조입니다.

trans-unit.source: The evaluation of this condition returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: 이 조건은이 분기를 실행 해야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is optional on the last <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> and required in other cases.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 마지막 선택적 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>에 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity>며 다른 경우에는 필수입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"></xref> that returns a value that indicates whether this branch should be run.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition"> </xref> 이 분기를 실행 해야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 하 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IfElseBranchActivity.Condition*> property.
